integrations.title: Powerful Integrations
integrations.description: Connect with leading platforms to enhance your property management experience

cta.title: Ready to Experience Seamless Integration?
cta.description: Discover how our integrations can transform your property management workflow

hero.title: Discover More: How Integrations Benefit You
hero.description: SmartHoster connects with over 70 of the industry's leading platforms — not because we need them, but because they give you more flexibility, visibility, and control.
hero.subtitle: Our core operations are fully in-house: we manage billing, compliance, maintenance, and communication ourselves — with powerful automation and our own custom-built tools. But when you want more — or want to plug into your favorite platforms — our system is ready.

whyMatter.title: Why Integrations Still Matter
whyMatter.description: At SmartHoster, we've already automated 90% of what matters: Our invoicing software handles all commission and payout logic, SEF and eFatura reporting is handled internally or semi-automated, Smart pricing, calendar syncing, and guest communication are built-in. But we're not a walled garden. If you want to connect to external tools — for cleaning, smart locks, pricing, or analytics — we're integrated and ready to go. This is about optional power. And it's all plug-and-play.

smartLocks.title: Smart Locks & Access Control
smartLocks.description: Guests self-check-in securely. Our team can also open doors remotely — no one's left outside.

payments.title: Optional Invoicing & Payments
payments.description: While we use our own system, you can sync external tools to mirror or track your billing if needed.

compliance.title: Government & Compliance Portals
compliance.description: Whether via our own system or integrated channels, all reporting is covered — reliably and on time.

cleaning.title: Cleaning & Operational Services
cleaning.description: Available for partial management plans or external coordination — and if you prefer, we're happy to help coordinate cleanings using our own trusted in-house teams.

pricing.title: Pricing & Calendar Tools
pricing.description: We already optimize pricing internally, but external pricing engines can be synced for clients who prefer more granular control.

guestExperience.title: Guest Experience Enhancers
guestExperience.description: Enhance check-ins and guest guides with branded digital experiences — fully optional, easily integrated.

travel.title: Travel & Logistics Add-ons
travel.description: Add extra services to boost guest satisfaction — they plug right in, no extra effort.

insurance.title: Insurance & Damage Management
insurance.description: Offer owners peace of mind and automate protection flows.

additionalBenefits.optional: All integrations are optional and non-disruptive
additionalBenefits.coreHandled: We handle the core systems — no duplicate work
additionalBenefits.extendable: You can extend functionality if needed — and we'll help configure it
additionalBenefits.autoCommissions: Your commissions are always calculated automatically
additionalBenefits.noContracts: No long-term contracts — we operate on a month-to-month basis
additionalBenefits.cleaningSupport: If you want to use our cleaning teams in partial management, we're happy to help coordinate that too

flexibility.title: True Flexibility, Backed by Full Service
flexibility.description: Want to use your own cleaners? You can. Want to plug in Stripe, PriceLabs, or a lock system you already use? We've got it covered. Prefer everything fully managed by our team? That's our specialty.
flexibility.subtitle: SmartHoster was built to adapt — not force you into a box.

bottomLine.title: Here's the Bottom Line
bottomLine.scaling: And if you ever want to scale, adjust, or simplify — the system flexes with you.

cta.title: Book Your Free 30-Minute Consultation
cta.description: We'll walk you through what's built-in, what's optional, and how we plug into your property with zero friction.
cta.subtitle: Month-to-month. No setup traps. Just clarity, automation, and growth.
